widgets.title: Queue Length by Service
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(CurrentQueueLength) FROM NETCLRLocksAndThreads FACET Name WHERE Name != '_Global_' SINCE 1 day AGO TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Current Queue Length
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(CurrentQueueLength) FROM NETCLRLocksAndThreads FACET Name WHERE Name != '_Global_' SINCE 30 minutes AGO

widgets.title: Global Queue Length
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(CurrentQueueLength) FROM NETCLRLocksAndThreads FACET Name WHERE Name = '_Global_' SINCE 1 day AGO TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Global Queue Length
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(CurrentQueueLength) FROM NETCLRLocksAndThreads WHERE Name = '_Global_'
